title: I'm writing a short story for school but I'm stuck on how to continue, can someone help? - Quora

response.answer_text: One way to possibly continue on writing is to write the end. It doesn’t matter if you actually use the end you write. It acts as an anchor for the rest of the story.

Taking a walk outside may help, or listening to thematic music, drinking tea, asking for advice from friends or peers. There is no reliable cure for writer’s block haha, but you can try a lot of things.
